name: Accuform Multilingual Safety Kit
description: Complete OSHA signage and labels in English, Spanish, and French for compliant, inclusive safety communication.
target_audience_match: Perfect for safety leads juggling compliance and clarity across multilingual field crews.

name: J.J. Keller Multilingual Compliance Kit
description: Essential OSHA materials with training guides, forms, and posters in English and Spanish.
target_audience_match: Ideal for HR teams who want to confidently onboard Spanish-speaking staff without losing sleep over compliance gaps.

name: Brady Bilingual Safety Starter Kit
description: Bilingual safety tags, lockout signs, and training posters for on-site hazard communication.
target_audience_match: Great fit for foremen managing busy sites where quick, clear bilingual alerts can’t wait.

name: Seton Multilingual Emergency Station Kit
description: First aid and emergency instructions with multilingual visuals and OSHA-compliant documentation.
target_audience_match: Designed for high-risk zones where fast, visual-first safety saves lives — regardless of language spoken.

name: National Safety Council Bilingual Training Pack
description: Complete training video + handbook set in English and Spanish for crew onboarding.
target_audience_match: Best for teams regularly onboarding workers who need OSHA basics in both English and Spanish, fast.
